attributes.action: Stop water fluoridation measures in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Water fluoridation has no basis in logic, evidence or modern science.

Whats more water fluoridation is compulsive medication. The answer for better teeth is better dental hygiene, NOT mass medication. 

Fluorides effect is TOPICAL not SYSTEMIC. I.e Toothpaste works because it has contact with the teeth.

Drinking water with fluoride goes straight into the stomach, and the effect is nullified.

There are many more arguments against water fluoridation. And the evidence against is overwhelming.

Dont be treated like a fool, please sign the petition.

Many thanks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
